commit.message:
PR c++/84374 - diagnose invalid uses of decltype(auto).

	* decl.c (grokdeclarator): Diagnose wrong usage of decltype(auto) in
	a function declaration.

	* g++.dg/cpp1y/auto-fn57.C: New test.

From-SVN: r275557

files.patch:

+

+	* decl.c (grokdeclarator): Diagnose wrong usage of decltype(auto) in
+	a function declaration.
+
